sentences.en: A centimeter can be infinitely divided into smaller units.
sentences.cn: 一厘米可以无穷尽地分成更小的单位。

sentences.en: Agriculture was based in the past on the family as a unit.
sentences.cn: 农业过去以一个家庭单元为基础。

sentences.en: All the units employ hollow burned - clay blocks as the basic raw material.
sentences.cn: 所有构件都用空心陶土砖做基本原料.

sentences.en: At least 17 different irregular units are engaged in the war.
sentences.cn: 至少有17个非正规军部队参战。
廉价的自己组装的厨房设备

sentences.en: Find and destroy, repeat destroy, these units.
sentences.cn: 找到并且销毁，重复一下，销毁这些部件。

sentences.en: Influenced by old ideas, some units assign posts according to seniority.
sentences.cn: 由于受旧观念的影响, 有些单位分配工作按资排辈.

sentences.en: Rebel artillery units have regularly bombarded the airport.
sentences.cn: 叛军的炮兵部队经常轰炸机场。

sentences.en: The anti - aircraft units opened fire and hit two of the enemy planes.
sentences.cn: 防空 部队开炮,击中了两架敌机.

sentences.en: The call-up of National Guard and reserve units begun in late August.
sentences.cn: 国民警卫队和预备役的征兵工作8月下旬开始。

sentences.en: The company was dissolved into smaller units.
sentences.cn: 那公司被分成几个较小的单位.

sentences.en: The flat-pack units are by Gower kitchens.
sentences.cn: 这套平板家具是高尔厨房用具公司出品的。

sentences.en: These front-line defences are backed up by armoured units in reserve.
sentences.cn: 前线的防务得到后备装甲部队的支援。

sentences.en: These units exposed children to many viewpoints of a given issue.
sentences.cn: 这些单元让孩子们接触到有关某一特定问题的多种观点。

sentences.en: We must pick out the enemy's weakest units for attack.
sentences.cn: 我们必须找敌人最薄弱的部队攻击.

sentences.en: Your intake of alcohol should not exceed two units per day.
sentences.cn: 每天的饮酒量不应超过两个计量单位。

trans.tran_cn: 单位，[药剂学]（药物、疫苗、血清、抗原等的）单位( unit的名词复数 )，装置，一件（商品），（栋公寓大楼中的一套公寓）单元
trans.tran_en: If you consider something as a unit, you consider it as a single, complete thing
